title: Five-Star Luxurious Dead Sea Kempinski Resort
description: In an incredible setting on the edge of the Dead Sea, you'll find the five-star Kempinski Hotel Ishtar Dead Sea - a luxurious haven of timeless elegance, opulent interiors and gourmet dining. Experience the epitome of luxurious Kempinski hospitality: culinary possibilities are endless with five restaurants and bars, each offering unique and stylish dining experiences. Later, choose to lounge poolside or on the private sandy beach, before indulging like never before at The Ishtar Spa by Resense, where six outdoor treatment and relaxation areas, Tepidarium heated lounges and the largest hydro-pool in the Dead Sea await.
